next.excerpt: Figma Comments allows you to view and add new comments right from your phone. All you have to do is connect your Figma account and select the files you need. And as your teammates reply, you will see the new comments on the app, in real-time!
next.title: Figma Comments on Mobile - View and add comments on Figma using your mobile device.
